\let\paragraph\oldparagraph
\let\subparagraph\oldsubparagraph

\usepackage{titlesec, blindtext, color}

\titleformat{\chapter}[display]
  {\Huge\bfseries}
  {}
  {0pt}
  {\thechapter.\ }

\titleformat{name=\chapter,numberless}[display]
  {\Huge\bfseries}
  {}
  {0pt}
  {}

\titlespacing*{\chapter}{0pt}{0pt}{40pt}
